content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
Want to add a forms to choose you preferer color of door
Please go to the "Components" tab in the MakeInfinite studio and drag and drop a forms component into the canvas. Let me know when you've done that so I can assist you further!

content: Okay, I'm updating the header component to change the title based on the selected door color.

I've updated the header component so that the title will change based on the selected door color. It will now display "DoorMaster - [Selected Color] Door" when a color is chosen. If you have any more adjustments or features in mind, feel free to share!
